generated.css: .txt_tr_rep{align-items:stretch}.txt_tr_rep select{width:8rem;height:2rem;font-size:1rem;padding:.1rem;margin:0;border-radius:.4rem;box-shadow:0 2px 2px var(--main-ft-op-color),0 -1px var(--secondary-color) inset;background-color:var(--main-bg-color);color:var(--main-ft-color);border:1px solid var(--main-bg-color);outline:none;display:inline-block;-webkit-appearance:none;-moz-appearance:none;appearance:none;cursor:pointer}.txt_tr_rep select:hover{background-color:var(--secondary-db-color)}.txt_tr_rep select>*{width:8rem;background-color:var(--secondary-color);font-size:1rem}.txt_tr_rep select option:hover{cursor:pointer;background-color:var(--primary-color)}@media screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio:0){.txt_tr_rep select{padding-right:1.5rem}}.txt_tr_rep .custom_select{display:inline-block;margin:.2rem;position:relative}.txt_tr_rep .custom_select:after{content:">";font-family:Consolas,monospace;font-size:1rem;color:var(--main-ft-color);transform:rotate(90deg);position:absolute;right:.7rem;top:.3rem;padding:0 0 .1rem;border-bottom:1px solid var(--secondary-color);pointer-events:none}.txt_tr_rep .custom_select:before{content:"";position:absolute;right:.5rem;top:.5rem;width:1rem;height:1rem;//background:var(--main-bg-color);border-left:1px solid var(--secondary-color);pointer-events:none;display:block}
